meanings.definition: Large agricultural estates in Latin America.
meanings.sent1: The latifundios in the countryside were vast and sprawling.
meanings.sent2: Many workers were employed on the latifundios to cultivate crops.
meanings.sent3: The latifundios seemed to stretch on forever, like a never-ending farm.
meanings.sent4: The latifundios loomed over the landscape, dominating the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The image of the latifundios stayed etched in my mind, grand and imposing.

meanings.definition: The system of land ownership and agricultural production on such estates.
meanings.sent1: The latifundios' organization ensured efficient farming practices.
meanings.sent2: Ownership of the latifundios was passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The latifundios' management system was so strict, it felt like a farming dictatorship.
meanings.sent4: The latifundios' structure mirrored a well-oiled machine, each part working in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The latifundios' operation was like a symphony of agriculture, each element playing its part.
